price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ibutsa abagarariji intureka z’umusi w’umuhero w’isi, igihe umuntu uwo ari we wese azokwivugira ku gatwe kiwe yiregura, maze Imana Allah Igatunganiriza umuntu uwo ari we wese ku vyo yakoze, nta n’umwe muri bo rero azorenganywa mu kurengerezwa urugero rw’ibihano canke mu kugabanirizwa indishi.
arabic: ۞ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ تُجَٰدِلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهَا وَتُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

meta.transliteration: yawma tatī kullu nafsin tujādilu ʿan nafsihā watuwaffā kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
translations: and will be paid in full
